name: Local Transform Info

inputs.name: Transform
inputs.description: The Transform component you want to get its local transform information

outputs.name: Local Position
outputs.description: The local position of the Transform component

outputs.name: Local Rotation
outputs.description: The local rotation of the Transform component

outputs.name: Local Scale
outputs.description: The local scale of the Transform component

outputs.name: Up Dir
outputs.description: The local Y axis direction (green arrow) of the Transform component

outputs.name: Right Dir
outputs.description: The local X axis direction (red arrow) of the Transform component

outputs.name: Forward Dir
outputs.description: The local Z axis direction (blue arrow) of the Transform component

description: Get the local space position, rotation, and scale of a Transform component. If a Transform component is parented under another Transform component, it inherits the parent Transform component's local space coordinates.
